lead_paragraph: Even a late 'wardrobe malfunction' could not stop Michael Phelps from winning his 21st Olympic gold medal for the United States in the Rio pool on Tuesday.

headline.main: That's Torn It! Phelps Wins in Borrowed Cap
headline.print_headline: That's Torn It! Phelps Wins in Borrowed Cap

snippet: Even a late 'wardrobe malfunction' could not stop Michael Phelps from winning his 21st Olympic gold medal for the United States in the Rio pool on Tuesday....
